title: 3-D printing helps surgeons sharpen their craft

title_detail.value: 3-D printing helps surgeons sharpen their craft

summary: Surgical training is one more way that researchers are using 3-D printing to advance the quality of care. 3-D printed simulations of lifelike body parts allow surgeons in training the opportunity to practice complex surgeries before assisting with the real thing.
